{
sendMessage(“Your current position is X = +absX+ Y= +absY+”);
}

There, this should work.[/quote][quote=“ipwnzyou, post:19, topic:253429”] else if (command.startsWith(“mypos”))
{
sendMessage(“You are standing on X=”+absX+" Y="+absY);
}

item.title: Command- ::mypos
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer
item.description:
@Macoronizer wrote:

No, didn’t work.

} if (p.rights >= 0) {} if (p.rights >= 0) { if (cmd[0].equals("showinterface")) { p.frames.showInterface(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])); 
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("emote")) {
                p.requestAnim(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0);
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("gfx")) {
                p.requestGFX(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0);
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("npc")) {
                Server.engine.newNPC(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), p.absX,
                        p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1,
                        p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("tele")) {
                int x = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
                int y = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]);
                int h = Integer.parseInt(cmd[3]);
		  p.setCoords(x, y, h);
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("rebuildnpclist")) {
                p.rebuildNPCList = true;
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("restorestats")) {
                for (int i1 = 0; i1 < p.skillLvl.length; i1++) {
                    p.skillLvl[i1] = p.getLevelForXP(i1);
                    p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, i1);
                }
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("restoreenergy")) {
                p.runEnergy = 100;
                p.runEnergyUpdateReq = true;
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("restorespecial")) {
                p.specialAmount = 100;
                p.specialAmountUpdateReq = true;
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("emptyspecial")) {
                p.specialAmount = 0;
                p.specialAmountUpdateReq = true;
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("addxp")) {
                p.addSkillXP((double) Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]),
                        Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("coords")) {
                p.frames.sendMessage(p, "x: " + p.absX + ", y: " + p.absY);
            }
             else if (cmd[0].equals("pnpc")) {
                p.npcType = (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
                p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
                p.updateReq = true;
            }
        }
    } catch (Exception error) {
        error.printStackTrace();
    }
}

}

Ok, when I open my " Command File " that’s what I get ( well, that’s like the bottom… when I scroll down, anyways… ).
So, as you can see. I place the command " Coords " into it. However, it doesn’t work in-game, same as Zofis. Moreover, none of them work, pnpc, emote, restoreenergy, tele, npc, gfx, coords. I don’t know what I’m doing wrong. I really want the “coords” command to work, so I can know what coords I’m standing on. Help please? :o

Read full topic

item.title: Command- ::mypos
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Macoronizer, post:11, topic:253429”][quote] p.runEnergyUpdateReq = true;
} else if (cmd[0].equals(“restorespecial”)) {
p.specialAmount = 100;
p.specialAmountUpdateReq = true;
} else if (cmd[0].equals(“emptyspecial”)) {
p.specialAmount = 0;
p.specialAmountUpdateReq = true;
} else if (cmd[0].equals(“addxp”)) {
p.addSkillXP((double) Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]),
Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
} else if (cmd[3].equals(“coords”)) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “x: " + p.absX + “, y: " + p.absY);
}
else if (cmd[0].equals(“pnpc”)) {
p.npcType = (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;
}
}
} catch (Exception error) {
error.printStackTrace();
}
}
} else if (command.startsWith(“mypos”))
sendMessage(“You are standing on X=”+absX+” Y=”+absY); [/quote]

But I got this error.

item.title: Command- ::mypos
item.dc:creator: @zofis7 zofis7
item.description:
@zofis7 wrote:

/* * Class Commands * * Version 2.0 * * Moday, August 18, 2008 * * Created by Palidino76 Fixed by Tyler of RageSource. */

package palidino76.rs2.io.packets;

import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import palidino76.rs2.Server;
import palidino76.rs2.Engine;
import palidino76.rs2.players.Player;
import palidino76.rs2.util.Misc;

public class Commands implements Packet {

/**
 * Handles commands, chat text that starts with ::.
 * @param p The Player which the frame should be handled for.
 * @param packetId The packet id this belongs to.
 * @param packetSize The amount of bytes being recieved for this packet.
 */
public void handlePacket(Player p, int packetId, int packetSize) {
    if (p == null || p.stream == null) {
        return;
    }
    try {
        String playerCommand = p.stream.readString().toLowerCase();
        String[] cmd = playerCommand.split(" ");

        if (p.rights >= 0) {
            if (cmd[0].equals("male")) {
                p.look[0] = 7; // Hair
                p.look[1] = 16; // Beard
                p.look[2] = 18; // Torso
                p.look[3] = 28; // Arms
                p.look[4] = 34; // Bracelets
                p.look[5] = 38; // Legs
                p.look[6] = 42; // Shoes
                p.gender = 0;
                p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
                p.updateReq = true;
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("female")) {
                p.look[0] = 48; // Hair
                p.look[1] = 1000; // Beard
                p.look[2] = 57; // Torso
                p.look[3] = 64; // Arms
                p.look[4] = 68; // Bracelets
                p.look[5] = 77; // Legs
                p.look[6] = 80; // Shoes
                p.gender = 1;
                p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
                p.updateReq = true;
	} else if (cmd[0].equals("code")) {
                Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]),
                        Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("bandoskills")) {
            	p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You now have " + p.points + " bandos kills");		
	} else if (cmd[0].equals("wildy")) {
                p.teleportTo(3243, 3516, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577,
                        0);
            } else if(cmd[0].equals("bh")) {
                 p.teleportTo(3179, 3684, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
				 p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Use the High Level Crater to Join Bounty Hunter.");
            } else if(cmd[0].equals("train")) {
                 p.teleportTo(3254, 3266, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
				 p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Kill Cows to level.");
			} else if(cmd[0].equals("jad")) {
                 p.teleportTo(2397, 5154, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
				 p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Good luck killing Jad.");
			} else if(cmd[0].equals("kq")) {
                 p.teleportTo(3487, 9493, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
				 p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You teleport to the Kalphite Queen's Lair!");
            } else if(cmd[0].equals("kbd")) {
                 p.teleportTo(2273, 4695, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
                				 p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You teleport to the King Black Dragon's Lair!");
	} else if (cmd[0].equals("godwars")) {
                p.teleportTo(2882, 5311, 2, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577,
                        0);
		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "To fight the gods type ::armadyl ::bandos ::saradomin ::zamorak");
	} else if (cmd[0].equals("saradomin")) {
                p.teleportTo(2907, 5265, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577,
                        0);
						p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You teleport to Commander Zilyana's Room!");
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("help")) {
                p.frames.showInterface(p, 255);
                p.frames.setString(p, "Berky-Scape 508 Help By Berky and Chase. Join our Forums at www.berkyscape.smfforfree2.com, also enjoy the server and tell your friends Server update all the time!", 255, 3);
			} else if (cmd[0].equals("commands")) {
                p.frames.showInterface(p, 255);
                p.frames.setString(p, "Type  ::male ::female ::bank ::kq ::kbd ::godwars ::ancient ::lunar ::jad ::wildy ::bh ::train ::code ::bandoskills For more info join our forums at www.berkyscape.smfforfree2.com", 255, 3);
			} else if (cmd[0].equals("modern")) {
                p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 192); // Modern spells;
				p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You switch to modern spells.");
				} else if (cmd[0].equals("ancient")) {
                p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 388); // Magic tab
				p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You switch to Ancient spells.");
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("lunar")) {
                p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 430); // Magic tab (lunar)
			} else if (cmd[0].equals("home")) {
                p.teleportTo(3222, 3218, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577,
                        0);
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("zamorak")) {
                p.teleportTo(2925, 5331, 2, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577,
                        0);
						p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You teleport to K'ril Tsutsaroth's Room!");
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("bandos")) {
                p.teleportTo(2864, 5354, 2, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577,
                        0);
						p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You teleport to General Graardor's Room!");
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("armadyl")) {
                p.teleportTo(2839, 5296, 2, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577,
                        0);
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("bank")) {
                p.openBank();

            } else if (cmd[0].equals("players")) {
                p.frames.sendMessage(p,
                        "Server:<col=0000FF> There is currently "
                        + Engine.getPlayerCount() + " player(s) online.");
                // p.frames.sendMessage(p, "There is currently " + Engine.getPlayerCount() + " player(s) online.");
            }
        }
        if (p.rights >= 1) {}
        if (p.rights >= 2) {
            if (cmd[0].equals("showinterface")) {
                p.frames.showInterface(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));

            } else if (cmd[0].equals("emote")) {
                p.requestAnim(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0);
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("gfx")) {
                p.requestGFX(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0);
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("npc")) {
                Server.engine.newNPC(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), p.absX,
                        p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1,
                        p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("tele")) {
                int x = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
                int y = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]);
                int h = Integer.parseInt(cmd[3]);
		  p.setCoords(x, y, h);
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("rebuildnpclist")) {
                p.rebuildNPCList = true;
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("restorestats")) {
                for (int i1 = 0; i1 < p.skillLvl.length; i1++) {
                    p.skillLvl[i1] = p.getLevelForXP(i1);
                    p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, i1);
                }
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("restoreenergy")) {
                p.runEnergy = 100;
                p.runEnergyUpdateReq = true;
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("restorespecial")) {
                p.specialAmount = 100;
                p.specialAmountUpdateReq = true;
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("emptyspecial")) {
                p.specialAmount = 0;
                p.specialAmountUpdateReq = true;
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("addxp")) {
                p.addSkillXP((double) Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]),
                        Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
            } else if (cmd[0].equals("coords")) {
                p.frames.sendMessage(p, "x: " + p.absX + ", y: " + p.absY);
            }
             else if (cmd[0].equals("pnpc")) {
                p.npcType = (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
                p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
                p.updateReq = true;
            }
        }
    } catch (Exception error) {
        error.printStackTrace();
    }
}

}

that is what i get when I open my Commands.java file[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2008, 08:06:01 pm[/size][hr]sorry for being a noob lol but what do you mean by “name of variable?”

Read full topic

item.title: Command- ::mypos

@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(commandVar.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos"))
